text: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCL) is a company operating cruise ships, headquartered in Miami, Florida. It began in 1966 and currently owns eighteen ships. ==Ships== *Norwegian Jewel *Norwegian Epic *Norwegian Jade *Norwegian Pearl *Norwegian Sun *Norwegian Joy *Norwegian Gem *Norwegian Sky *Norwegian Star *Norwegian Spirit *Norwegian Bliss *Norwegian Encore *Norwegian Getaway *Norwegian Breakaway *Norwegian Dawn *Norwegian Escape *Norwegian Prima *Pride Of America Category:Cruise ships Category:Companies based in Miami Category:Transport in Florida
title: Norwegian Cruise Line
